ValidationRule.description: If Hire Type = Replacement, (Name of person being replaced, Resignation/Term Letter Notification and Resignation/Termination Date are required)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND (RecordType.Name = "Hiring Request", ISPICKVAL(Reason_for_Replacement__c ,"Replacement"), OR( ISBLANK(Name_of_person_being_replaced__c ), ISBLANK(TEXT(Resignation_Letter_Term_Notification__c )), ISBLANK (Predicted_Resignation_Termination_Date__c) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Hire Type = Replacement, "Name of person being replaced", "Resignation/Term Letter Notification" and "Resignation/Termination Date" are required.
